Hydras/Perceptor:

"Then... "hissed the male"We just hve to choice how do i=
t: disguise you as one maximal and capture the true one... Or introduce you=
 there as a Maximal pod and take the risk that unicron try to capture it"

=
"Will be hard to decide that poin..."said Perceptor
  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday=
, April 30, 2005 10:13 PM
  Subject: Re: Reclusa


  Reclusa::

  She glanc=
ed at Perceptor then turned to look at Hydras. "Well, if one
  is to do it,=
 then one must be good at hiding themselves."  She took a
  deep breath and=
 let it out slowly. "Then sir, I volunteer for the job.
  I suggested it in=
 the first place. By warrior code, I'll go."

  She wanted revenge and what=
 better way than to watch up close and make
  sure they are destroyed. 



=

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
  > Hydra=
s:
  > 
  > The male hissed and replied "Just two or three years ago, we
  =
sucesfully introduced a spy there... but eventually he was discovered,
  an=
d altough he managed to scape and capture a good hostage... He was
  discov=
ered... if oher spy have to go there.. then this must be planned
  carefull=
y... kidnapping a maximal and disguise the volunteer as it, or
  disguise t=
he volunteer as maximal and behaves likes one... for at
  time, but if we d=
o that we have to recreate a pod's arrival and we
  have the risk that Unic=
ron decides to capture our spy... that're the
  ways that I suggest"
